name: A Time to Shine Child Care
description: Day care center providing early childhood education and child care services in a safe and nurturing environment. Offers opportunities for children to explore and experience a variety of activities and ideas. Currently hiring preschool teachers and accepting new enrollments.
source: Verified from official Facebook page, Google search results, and business listing
eligibility_requirements: Children of all ages welcome for child care services
populations_served: Infants, toddlers, preschoolers, and school-age children
cost_information: $$ (Moderate pricing). Contact for current rates and availability.
notes: VERIFIED INFORMATION: All contact information verified on 2025-01-15. CITATIONS: Contact information verified from official Facebook page (https://www.facebook.com/Timetoshinechildcare/).
